Linear Mixed Models¶

class limix_inference.SlowLMM(y, mean, cov)[source]¶

General Linear Mixed Models.

Models

\[\mathbf y \sim \mathcal N\big(~ \mathbf m;~ \mathrm K ~\big)\]

for any mean \(\mathbf m\) and covariance matrix \(\mathrm K\).

Parameters:
  • y (array_like) – real-valued outcome.
  • mean (mean_function) – mean function defined. (Refer to Mean functions.)
  • cov (covariance_function) – covariance function defined. (Refer to Covariance functions.)
class limix_inference.FastLMM(y, Q0, Q1, S0, covariates=None)[source]¶
